brief_title: Bioequivalence Study of Doxorubicin Hydrochloride Liposome Injection (Lipodox®) in Chinese Patients
brief_summary: Bioequivalence study is proposed to be carried out on patients of breast cancer/ ovarian cancer, who are administrated for Doxorubicin Hydrochloride Liposomal Injection Lipodox® or Caelyx® in a dose of 50 mg/m2.
